baseOffenseQuestions.text: Was the intent to violate the Controlled Substances Act?

yesResult.description: Intent to violate Controlled Substances Act - apply §2D1.9 (Placing or Maintaining Dangerous Devices on Federal Property to Protect the Unlawful Production of Controlled Substances; Attempt or Conspiracy)

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Was the intent to obstruct the harvesting of timber and did property destruction result?

yesResult.description: Intent to obstruct timber harvesting with resulting property destruction - apply §2B1.1 (Theft, Property Destruction, and Fraud)

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the offense involve reckless disregard to the risk that another person would be placed in danger of death or serious bodily injury under circumstances manifesting extreme indifference to such risk?

yesResult.description: Reckless disregard with extreme indifference to risk of death or serious bodily injury - apply offense level from §2A2.2 (Aggravated Assault)
